page.title: 03PRE SCHOOL/INFANT EDUCATION
page.content: Children can start Dunmow County Infant School in the term in which they are 5.They are educated there until they are 7.There are 4 pre_ school playgroups in our block which take chidren between 3 and 5 years old.Anna wrote this about her school.{ At school we can have school dinners or sandwiches.When the bell goes we line up and then we go into the hall. We have to go into the kitchen to get our dinner.We have 10 points in all.We have four points for our main course, we can have ham or eggs or choppy or cheese or fish fingers.My favourite is choppy.Then we choose a vegetable it is 2 points,we can have potato or rice The next thing to choose is 2 points, we can have peas or cabbage or baked beans or beans or salad.For our last course we can choose cake or meringue or jelly or a drink.I like my dinners.
